title: Number of road deaths in Switzerland 2006 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of fatalities, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately negative which exists from 2012 to 2006.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018 to 2016.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2016 to 2014.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2014 to 2012.
gold: In 2018 , 233 fatalities were recorded on Swiss roads . Between 2006 and 2018 , traffic related deaths declined by over one third , with the lowest number seen in 2016 at 216 such incidences . Switzerland was one of the safest countries in Europe for road users .
